injuries.content: 20220726 St. Louis Cardinals: Ty Blach diagnosed with back spasms, is day-to-day for 6 days. 20220726 Minnesota Twins: SP Basty?o Pombal was injured . The Diagnosis: flu-like symptoms. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220727 St. Louis Cardinals: Zack Jackson diagnosed with a ruptured finger tendon, will miss 3 months. 20220727 Cleveland Indians: SP De-wei Ou was injured . The Diagnosis: flu. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220728 Detroit Tigers: SP Anastasio Mendoza was injured . The Diagnosis: flu-like symptoms. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220729 Tampa Bay Rays: 2B Andrew Noviello was injured in a collision at a base. The Diagnosis: chipped tooth. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220729 Philadelphia Phillies: 2B Darnell Sweeney was injured in a collision at a base. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220729 Colorado Rockies: C Blaise Maris was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220729 New York Mets: SP Brenden Heiss was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220730 Philadelphia Phillies: Darnell Sweeney diagnosed with a bruised knee, is day-to-day for one week. 20220730 Atlanta Braves: RP Matt Bowman was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: strained back. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last one week. 20220730 San Francisco Giants: RP Tyler Pill was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: sprained ankle. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 3 days. 20220731 Colorado Rockies: Blaise Maris diagnosed with a broken kneecap, will miss 4 months. 20220731 Los Angeles Angels: Rosell Herrera has suffered a setback in his recovery. He is not expected to recover for another 4 weeks. 20220731 Washington Nationals: CF Juan Rodr?guez was injured . The Diagnosis: dizziness and nausea. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220731 Philadelphia Phillies: SP Severino Gonzalez was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: sore shoulder. He's expected to miss about 1-2 weeks. 20220731 Cincinnati Reds: RP Justin De Fratus was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220731 Boston Red Sox: SP Grant Sloan was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: back tightness. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220801 New York Mets: Brenden Heiss diagnosed with a herniated disc, will miss 3 months.

news.content: 20220730 Chicago Cubs: Jake Fraley goes 2-5 against the Atlanta Braves, extending his hitting streak to 20 games! 20220730 Washington Nationals: Derian Cruz goes 5-5 against the Miami Marlins, with 1 RBI and 2 R. 20220801 DH Marcus Vidales of the Detroit Tigers honored: Wins the MLB AL Player of the Week Award. 20220801 LF Jesse Winker of the Colorado Rockies honored: Wins the MLB NL Player of the Week Award. 20220801 RF Steven Sensley of the Houston Astros honored: Wins the MLB AL Batter of the Month Award. 20220801 RF Steven Moya of the St. Louis Cardinals honored: Wins the MLB NL Batter of the Month Award. 20220801 CL Josue Uribe of the Houston Astros honored: Wins the MLB AL Pitcher of the Month Award. 20220801 SP Mario Ram?rez of the Los Angeles Dodgers honored: Wins the MLB NL Pitcher of the Month Award. 20220801 LF Yang-cheng Jiang of the Oakland Athletics honored: Wins the MLB AL Rookie of the Month Award. 20220801 3B Riley Hogan of the Arizona Diamondbacks honored: Wins the MLB NL Rookie of the Month Award.
